name: RN apps: Custom TOS - Agree while using MFA

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Lindy Isherwood, October 21, 2020 09:49AM
  • Marked this test N/A for Rainforest as it is not possible to set up MFA on the VMs

inline.description:
RN Custom TOS - Agree while using MFA
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Login as the test user on webapp and enable MFA on the account
  2. As a sys admin update the TOS
  3. Login as the user on mobile
  4. Enter MFA

customFields.Related ticket(s): • RN Apps (iOS & Android) Terms of Service show no "Agree/Disagree" buttons — MM-17630
